codeArtifactId.description: The ID of the code asset.

command.description: The command to execute on startup of the job

optional.description: If the input is optional. Defaults to false/required.

default.description: Default value for an input. Must match the given type.

dataType.description: Component input type. String is used for type extensibility.

min.description: The minimum value that can be accepted, used to validate the inputs for type float/int.

max.description: The maximum value that can be accepted, used to validate the inputs for type float/int.

enum.description: The enum definition list for enum types, used to validate the inputs for type enum.

type.description: Component output type. String is used for type extensibility.
Component Type, should match the schema.

displayName.description: DisplayName of the component on the UI. Defaults to same as name.

isDeterministic.description: Whether or not its deterministic. Defaults to true.

inputs.description: Defines input ports of the component. The string key is the name of input, which should be a valid Python variable name.

outputs.description: Defines output ports of the component. The string key is the name of Output, which should be a valid Python variable name.

codeConfiguration.description: Code configuration of the job. Includes CodeArtifactId and Command.

DockerSpecification.description: Class to represent configuration settings for Docker

type.description: Docker specification must be either Build or Image

platform.description: The platform information of the docker image.

DockerImage.description: Class to represent configuration settings for Docker Build

dockerImageUri.description:
Image name of a custom base image.
<seealso href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/machine-learning/how-to-deploy-custom-docker-image#use-a-custom-base-image" />

DockerBuild.description: Class to represent configuration settings for Docker Build

dockerfile.description:
Docker command line instructions to assemble an image.
<seealso href="https://repo2docker.readthedocs.io/en/latest/config_files.html#dockerfile-advanced-environments" />

context.description:
Path to a snapshot of the Docker Context. This property is only valid if Dockerfile is specified.
The path is relative to the asset path which must contain a single Blob URI value.
Microsoft.MachineLearning.ManagementFrontEnd.Contracts.Assets.Asset.Path<seealso href="https://docs.docker.com/engine/context/working-with-contexts/" />

livenessRoute.description: The route to check the liveness of the inference server container.

readinessRoute.description: The route to check the readiness of the inference server container.

scoringRoute.description: The port to send the scoring requests to, within the inference server container.

EnvironmentSpecificationVersion.description:
Data Transfer Object (DTO) for an Execution Environment Specification. Name and
version should default to the AzureML-Minimal environment version tested with the
current SDK client version as this is a main use-case.
<see href="https://repo2docker.readthedocs.io/en/latest/specification.html" />

type.description:
Environment specification is either user managed or curated by the Azure ML service
<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/machine-learning/resource-curated-environments" />

condaFile.description:
Standard configuration file used by conda that lets you install any kind of package, including Python, R, and C/C++ packages
<see href="https://repo2docker.readthedocs.io/en/latest/config_files.html#environment-yml-install-a-conda-environment" />

generatedBy.description: If the name version are system generated (anonymous registration) or user generated.

tags.description: Tag dictionary. Tags can be added, removed, and updated.

systemData.description: System data associated with resource provider

EnvironmentSpecificationVersionResourceA.description: A paginated list of EnvironmentSpecificationVersion entities.

value.description: An array of objects of type EnvironmentSpecificationVersion.

GeneralSettings.description: General Settings to submit an AutoML Job.

enableModelExplainability.description: Flag to turn on explainability on best model.

taskType.description: Type of AutoML Experiment [Classification, Regression, Forecasting]

TrainingDataSettings.description:
Dataset datamodel.
This is the class represents the Dataset Json string structure that passed into Jasmine.

nCrossValidations.description:
Number of cross validation folds to be applied on training dataset
when validation dataset is not provided.

validationSize.description:
The fraction of training dataset that needs to be set aside for validation purpose.
Values between (0.0 , 1.0)
Applied when validation dataset is not provided.

DataSettings.description: This class represents the Dataset Json that is passed into Jasmine for training.

forecastingCountryOrRegion.description:
Country or region for holidays for forecasting tasks.
These should be ISO 3166 two-letter country/region codes, for example 'US' or 'GB'.

blockListModels.description: List of Algos/Models to be blocked for training.

allowListModels.description: List of Algos/Models to be Allowed for training.

experimentExitScore.description: Exit score for the AutoML experiment.

computeId.description: Resource ID of the compute resource.

isLocal.description: Set to true for jobs running on local compute.

datastoreId.description: ARM ID of the datastore where the job logs and artifacts are stored, or null for the default container ("azureml") in the workspace's storage account.

path.description: Path within the datastore to the job logs and artifacts.

interactionEndpoints.description:
Dictionary of endpoint URIs, keyed by enumerated job endpoints.
For local jobs, a job endpoint will have a value of FileStreamObject.

tags.description: Tag dictionary. Tags can be added, removed, and updated.

experimentName.description: The name of the experiment the job belongs to. If not set, the job is placed in the "Default" experiment.

output.description: Location of the job output logs and artifacts.

priority.description:
Job priority for scheduling policy. Only applies to AMLCompute.
Private preview  is only for whitelisted customers

dataSettings.description: Collection of registerd Tabular Dataset Ids required for training.

trainingSettings.description: Advanced configuration settings for an AutoML Job.

localReference.description: Location of data inside the container process.

mode.description: Mechanism for accessing the data artifact.

distributionType.description: Specifies the type of distribution framework.

workerCount.description: Number of workers. Overwrites the node count in compute binding.

processCount.description: Total process count for the distributed job.

identityType.description: Specifies the type of identity framework.

clientId.description: Specifies a user-assigned identity by client ID. For system-assigned, do not set this field.

objectId.description: Specifies a user-assigned identity by object ID. For system-assigned, do not set this field.

msiResourceId.description: Specifies a user-assigned identity by resource ID. For system-assigned, do not set this field.

maxRunDurationSeconds.description: The max run duration in seconds, after which the job will be cancelled.

dataBindings.description: Mapping of data bindings used in the job.

environmentVariables.description: Environment variables included in the job.

mode.description: Mode type, can be set for DatasetId.

value.description: Literal Value of a data binding.

inputBinding.description: Reference to an output of another job's ComponentJobInput or reference to a ComponentJobInput.

datapath.description: Path location within the datastore for output data.

outputBinding.description: This is to pull the ComponentJobOutput from the overall PipelineOutputs.

continueRunOnStepFailure.description: Flag when set, continue pipeline execution if a step fails.

defaultDatastoreName.description: Default datastore name shared by all pipeline jobs

definition.description: Todo remove (keeping temporarily for backwards compat)

ParameterSamplingConfiguration.description: class for all hyperparameter sampling algorithms

parameterSpace.description: A dictionary containing each parameter and its distribution. The dictionary key is the name of the parameter

samplingType.description: Type of the hyperparameter sampling algorithms

EarlyTerminationPolicyConfiguration.description: Early termination policies enable canceling poor-performing runs before they complete

BanditPolicyConfiguration.description: Defines an early termination policy based on slack criteria, and a frequency and delay interval for evaluation

MedianStoppingPolicyConfiguration.description: Defines an early termination policy based on running averages of the primary metric of all runs

TruncationSelectionPolicyConfiguration.description: Defines an early termination policy that cancels a given percentage of runs at each evaluation interval.

primaryMetricGoal.description: Defines supported metric goals for hyperparameter tuning

dataBindings.description: Mapping of data bindings used in the job.

environmentVariables.description: Environment variables included in the job.

parameterSamplingConfiguration.description: class for all hyperparameter sampling algorithms

displayName.description: Display name of the label class.

subclasses.description: Dictionary of subclasses of the label class.

displayName.description: Display name of the label category.

allowMultiSelect.description: Indicates whether it is allowed to select multiple classes in this category.

classes.description: Dictionary of label classes in this category.

uri.description: The link to a page with detailed labeling instructions for labelers.

assetName.description: Name of the data asset to perform labeling.

incrementalDatasetRefreshEnabled.description: Indicates whether to enable incremental dataset refresh.

inferencingComputeBinding.description: AML compute binding used in inferencing.

trainingComputeBinding.description: AML compute binding used in training.

mlAssistEnabled.description: Indicates whether MLAssist feature is enabled.

annotationType.description: Annotation type of image labeling job.

LabelingJobTextProperties.description: Properties of a labeling job for text data

incrementalDatasetLastRefreshTime.description: The time of last successful incremental dataset refresh in UTC.

message.description: A human-readable representation of the message code.

createdTimeUtc.description: Time in UTC at which the message was created.

datasetConfiguration.description: Configuration of dataset used in the job.

mlAssistConfiguration.description: Configuration of MLAssist feature in the job.

projectId.description: Internal id of the job(Previously called project).

createdTimeUtc.description: Created time of the job in UTC timezone.
